==English== ===Phrase=== {{en-phrase}} # {{lb|en|internet|text messaging}} {{initialism of|en|[[I]] [[hope]] [[not]]}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=hin|NIH|hin}} ---- ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{qualifier|standard}} {{IPA|de|/iːn/}} :* {{audio|de|De-ihn.ogg|audio}} :* {{rhymes|de|iːn}} * {{qualifier|colloquially in unstressed position}} {{IPA|de|/ən/}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|de|pronoun forms}} # {{lb|de|personal}} {{inflection of|de|er||acc}}; [[him]] (''direct object''). # {{lb|de|personal}} {{label|de|obsolete}} dative of ''[[sie#German|sie]]''; [[them]] (''indirect object''). #* {{rfex|de}} ===See also=== * {{l|de|er}} * {{l|de|ihm}} * {{l|de|seiner}} * {{l|de|ihnen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:German personal pronouns]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|hrx|gem-pro|*inǭ}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/iːn/}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|hrx|pronoun}} # stressed [[accusative]] of [[er]]: [[him]] (''direct object''). #: {{ux|hrx|Ich hon das kaafd fer '''ihn'''.|I have bought it for '''him'''.}} ====Inflection==== {{hrx-decl-personal pronouns}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary]
